QAPair.Question: What is (are) Stress and your heart ?
QAPair.Answer: Stress is the way your mind and body react to a threat or a challenge. Simple things, like a crying child, can cause stress. You also feel stress when you're in danger, like during a robbery or car crash. Even positive things, like getting married, can be stressful. Stress is a fact of life. But when it adds up, it can affect your mental and physical health. Too much stress can also be bad for your heart.
